TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DesignerDataTable extends System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataTableBase

Docs.summary: Represents a table in the data store.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataTable> class is one of several types that represent the schema of a data store at design-time. These schema items are made available to controls by designers implementing the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment> interface. Controls access schema objects by calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.GetConnectionSchema%2A> method of the interface.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataTable> class represents a single table in the data store. A collection of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataTable> objects is returned when you call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDesignerDataSchema.GetSchemaItems%2A> method with the `schemaClass` parameter set to <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataSchemaClass.Tables?displayProperty=fullName>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name) cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified name.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name, string owner) cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified name and owner.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.ICollection CreateRelationships() cil managed

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, returns a collection of relationship objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataTable.CreateRelationships%2A> method is called the first time the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataTable.Relationships%2A> property is accessed, to populate the collection of data table relationships.

Docs.summary: Gets a collection of relationships defined for a table.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A relationship describes a link between two tables in a data store. The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataTable.Relationships%2A> property returns a collection that represents all the relationships between this table and other tables in the data store.
